member.name: T:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider
member.summary: Central provider for source-generated type registrations. Used to provide AOT-compatible type lookups.
Registers type information from a source-generated assembly. Called by module initializers in generated code.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterListTypes(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Type,System.Type})
member.summary: Registers pre-computed List<T> type mappings.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterClosedPreProcessors(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type},System.Type})
member.summary: Registers pre-computed closed pre-processor type mappings.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterClosedPostProcessors(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type,System.Type},System.Type})
member.summary: Registers pre-computed closed post-processor type mappings.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterClosedPreProcessorFactories(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type},System.Func{System.Object}})
member.summary: Registers factory functions for creating closed pre-processor instances.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterClosedPostProcessorFactories(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type,System.Type},System.Func{System.Object}})
member.summary: Registers factory functions for creating closed post-processor instances.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetCommandHandler(System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Tries to get the handler type for a command.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetPreProcessors(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Type}@)
member.summary: Tries to get pre-processor types for a request type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetPostProcessors(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Type}@)
member.summary: Tries to get post-processor types for a request type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetEndpointTypes(System.Type,System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type}@)
member.summary: Tries to get the request/response types for an endpoint type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetListType(System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed List<T> type for an element type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetClosedPreProcessor(System.Type,System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed closed pre-processor type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetClosedPostProcessor(System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed closed post-processor type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryCreateClosedPreProcessor(System.Type,System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to create a closed pre-processor instance using an AOT-safe factory.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryCreateClosedPostProcessor(System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to create a closed post-processor instance using an AOT-safe factory.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryCreatePreProcessorFromClosedType(System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to create a pre-processor instance from its closed generic type using an AOT-safe factory.
member.param: The closed generic processor type (e.g., SecurityProcessor<Request>).
The created processor instance if found.
member.returns: True if the factory was found and instance created; otherwise false.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryCreatePostProcessorFromClosedType(System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to create a post-processor instance from its closed generic type using an AOT-safe factory.
member.param: The closed generic processor type (e.g., MyPostProcessor<Request, Response>).
The created processor instance if found.
member.returns: True if the factory was found and instance created; otherwise false.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterCommandHandlerExecutorTypePairs(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type}})
member.summary: Registers pre-computed command handler executor type pairs. The actual CommandHandlerExecutor types are constructed using the provided open generic type.
member.param: The open generic CommandHandlerExecutor<,> type.
The command and result type pairs.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterCommandHandlerInterfaces(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Type,System.Type})
member.summary: Registers pre-computed command handler interface type mappings.

member.summary: Registers pre-computed job queue type mappings.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterJobQueueFactories(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.Type},System.Func{System.IServiceProvider,System.Object}})
member.summary: Registers factory functions for creating job queue instances. These direct new() calls ensure the AOT compiler preserves the constructors.

member.summary: Registers pre-computed EventBus<T> type mappings.

member.summary: Registers pre-computed closed request binder type mappings.

member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed ICommandHandler<TCommand> or ICommandHandler<TCommand, TResult> interface type.

member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed JobQueue<TCommand, TResult, TStorageRecord, TStorageProvider> type.

member.summary: Tries to create a JobQueue instance using a pre-registered factory.

member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed EventBus<TEvent> type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.TryGetClosedRequestBinder(System.Type,System.Type,System.Type@)
member.summary: Tries to get a pre-computed closed request binder type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.RegisterEventHandlers(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Type}})
member.summary: Registers pre-computed event handler type mappings.

member.summary: Tries to get event handler types for an event type.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.GenericTypeRegistryProvider.GetJobQueueTypesForStorage(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all pre-registered job queue types for a specific storage record and provider.

member.name: T:FastEndpoints.IServiceResolverBase
member.summary: interface used by fastendpoints for resolving services from the DI container. implement this interface and register the implementation in MS DI for customizing service resolving.

member.summary: try to resolve an instance for the given type from the dependency injection container. will return null if unresolvable.

member.summary: try to resolve an instance for the given type from the dependency injection container. will return null if unresolvable.
member.param: the type of the service to resolve

member.name: T:FastEndpoints.IServiceResolver
member.summary: interface used by fastendpoints for resolving services from the DI container. implement this interface and register the implementation in MS DI for customizing service resolving.

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.IServiceResolver.CreateInstance(System.Type,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: create an instance of a given type (which may not be registered in the DI container). this method will be called repeatedly. so a cached delegate/compiled expression using something like should be used for instance creation.
member.param: the type to create an instance of
optional service provider

member.name: M:FastEndpoints.IServiceResolver.CreateSingleton(System.Type)
member.summary: create an instance of a given type (which may not be registered in the DI container) which will be used as a singleton. a utility such as may be used. repeated calls with the same input type should return the same singleton instance by utilizing an internal concurrent/thread-safe cache.
member.param: the type to create an instance of

member.name: P:FastEndpoints.ServiceResolver.InstanceNotSet
member.summary: Indicates whether the service resolver is not set.

member.name: P:FastEndpoints.ServiceResolver.Instance
member.summary: Gets the service resolver.
